ygData.subject: Errors in job.log
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, yesterday I encountered a strange issue where the job.log -file got huge (around 7 GB). I learned that this file should be rather small. I could reproduce

Hi,

yesterday I encountered a strange issue where the "job.log"-file got h=
uge (around 7 GB). I learned that this file should be rather small. I could=
 reproduce the errors. Here is an excerpt of my job.log:

18T20:06:21.050Z =
WARNING unable to get character at index=3D4772 (fileIndex=3D4772): java.ni=
o.charset.MalformedInputException: Input length =3D 2 (in thread 'ToeThread=
 #18: http://www.infineon.com/cms/media/career/job24tv.flv'; in processor '=
extractorHtml')
2010-01-18T20:06:21.086Z WARNING unable to get character at=
 index=3D4773 (fileIndex=3D4773): java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException:=
 Input length =3D 2 (in thread 'ToeThread #18: http://www.infineon.com/cms/=
media/career/job24tv.flv'; in processor 'extractorHtml')
(..... keeps repea=
ting ...)

So, I guess that therre is an error which probably should not be=
 in this file. I guess a better place for logging that exception is in logs=
/alerts.log. But to my surprise this error seems also be logged in alerts.l=
og. 

I kept all my files, so that if someone wants to investigate that pro=
blem, I can help with some information. I even can send in the job-descript=
ion itself as the error occur quite fast (max. 20 min) after the crawl. 

S=
o, I will try to exclude *.flv files as I don't want to store them anyway a=
nd hope it will be better.

Cheers,
Tino
